description: Deploy and manage storage accounts and blob services. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to storage account, blob services and blob containers.
name: azure-storage
label: Azure Storage

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: resource
fields.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: Unique API ID of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Unique API Secret of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on how to get the secret key, see 'https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/microsoft-defender-atp/exposed-apis-create-app-webapp'.

fields.title: Tenant ID
fields.name: tenant_id
fields.description: ID of the tenant that you have been provided for your Azure Active Directory instance.

fields.title: Authorization Code
fields.name: code
fields.tooltip: Authorization code that you acquired in the authorization step.
fields.description: (Only Applicable to On behalf of User – Delegate Permission) The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Getting Access Tokens using the Delegate Permissions method section.

fields.title: Redirect URL
fields.description: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.
fields.name: redirect_url
fields.tooltip: (Only Applicable to On behalf of User – Delegate Permission) The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. The redirect URL that you specify here must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you have registered in your app registration portal.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: List Storage Accounts
operations.description: Retrieves the list of storage accounts from Azure Storage based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the storage accounts from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

operations.title: Get Storage Account
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific storage account from Azure Storage, based on the account name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to retrieve the storage account from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve the storage account from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the storage account from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

operations.title: Update Storage Account
operations.description: Updates a existing storage account in Azure Storage, based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to update a storage account in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to update a storage account in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to update a storage account in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to update storage account in Azure Storage.
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to update storage in Azure Storage.

operations.title: Delete Storage Account
operations.description: Deletes a specific storage account from Azure Storage, based on the account name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to delete the storage account from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to delete the storage account from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to delete the storage account from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

operations.title: List Blob Services
operations.description: Retrieves the list of blob services from Azure Storage based on the account name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to retrieve the blob services from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve the blob services from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the blob services from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

operations.title: Get Blob Service Properties
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific blob service properties from Azure Storage, based on the account name, blob service name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to retrieve the blob service properties from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve the blob service properties from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the blob service properties from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

operations.title: Set Blob Service Properties
operations.description: Sets the properties of a storage account’s Blob service in Azure Storage, based on the account name, blob service name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to set the blob service properties in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to set the blob service properties in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to set the blob service properties in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to set the blob services properties in Azure Storage.
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to set the blob services properties in Azure Storage.

operations.title: Create Blob Container
operations.description: Creates a blob container under the specified account in Azure Storage, based on the account name, container name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to create a blob container in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Container Name
parameters.description: Name of the container from which you want to create a blob container in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: containerName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to create a blob container in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to create a blob container in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to create blob container in Azure Log Analytics.
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to create blob container in Azure Log Analytics.

operations.title: List Blob Containers
operations.description: Retrieves the list of blob containers from Azure Storage based on the account name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to retrieve the blob containers from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve the blob containers from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the blob containers from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Search Query
parameters.description: (Optional) When specified, only container names starting with the filter will be listed.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.title: Include
parameters.description: (Optional) Include the properties for soft deleted blob containers.
parameters.name: $include

parameters.title: Page Size
parameters.description: (Optional) Maximum number of blob containers that this operation should return from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: $maxpagesize
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Maximum number of blob containers that this operation should return from Azure Storage.

operations.title: Get Blob Container
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific blob container from Azure Storage, based on the account name, container name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to retrieve the blob container from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Container Name
parameters.description: Name of the container from which you want to retrieve the blob container from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: containerName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve the blob container from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the blob container from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

operations.title: Update Blob Container
operations.description: Updates an existing blob container under the specified account in Azure Storage, based on the account name, container name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to update a blob container in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Container Name
parameters.description: Name of the container from which you want to update a blob container in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: containerName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to update a blob container in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to update a blob container in Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to update blob container in Azure Log Analytics.
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to update blob container in Azure Log Analytics.

operations.title: Delete Blob Container
operations.description: Deletes a specific blob container from Azure Storage, based on the account name, container name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Account Name
parameters.description: Name of the account from which you want to delete the blob container from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.title: Container Name
parameters.description: Name of the container from which you want to delete the blob container from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: containerName

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to delete the blob container from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to delete the blob container from Azure Storage.
parameters.name: subscriptionId
